description: Sara`s father is a rich English businessman living in India alone with his daughter after his wife died at child birth. He sends his daughter to a boarding school in London where she is supposed to get to know more of the world. Unfortunately he ends up bankrupt after a poor investment and shortly thereafter is stricken by yellow fever and dies. The news of his bancrupcy and death arrive in London right at the time of his daughter`s birthday party, leaving Sara overnight penyless and without anybody to rely on.
name: Ralph Crewe
